name: Reverse Robin: Second To Finale
description:
"He got served bad food, was rejected by a beautiful girl he just met, sees a poster for a missing pencil, and many more weird mishaps and revelations."

FEATURES:
- A really weird story
- 1,000+ words
- Kinetic, so no choices
- Free to use & Custom Voice Snippets
- Mismatched CC assets
- End credits video

Reverse Robin was originally a NaNoRenO project in 2013 featuring 6 of us writing in backwards order (starting from the end scene, then we write a scene to connect to it, and so forth) using 100% mismatched CC assets. The experiment resulted in a confusing yet somewhat coherent plot. I wrote the second to last scene (or technically the second scene?) which is about 1k words in length.

I have decided to release an enhanced version of my scene as a stand-alone entitled Reverse Robin: Second to Finale which has corrected typos, added sound affects, and includes a few new sentences at the end so it doesn't end so abruptly. The sub-title comes from the fact I was the writer that wrote the scene before a reveal in the climax. 

This is an important piece of my VN history, being the first collab I ever participated in, plus unfortunately the original Reverse Robin is no longer available (DL is down)--but I'd like to have my scene still available for historical purposes.
